title: If I donate to a masjid will I be rewarded as building a masjid? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: thank you foreign for every month is getting really high and they're struggling to pay the rent so my question is if I donate uh for if I donate to them do I get like the reward as a person would if they help build the Masjid like for every prayer every like active worship of course whatever you donate to a Masjid this would be a contribution similar to uh building one of course to build a message you probably need three hundred thousand four hundred thousand dollars but I can spare twenty or thirty dollars so this would add to building a Masjid and you will be rewarded accordingly in sha Allah
